localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The next time you are with your co-founder or potential partner, get to know them better by taking turns answering questions from this deck of co-founder cards... Learn more about each other so you can work better both together and individually.
blogPost.body: The next time you are with your co-founder or potential partner, get to know them better by taking turns answering questions from this deck of co-founder cards... Learn more about each other so you can work better both together and individually.
blogPost.title: Co-founder Question Cards - Questions to ask your co-founder to know each other better.
blogPost.author: Bryan Ho

localize.description: 下次你和你的联合创始人或潜在的合作伙伴在一起的时候，可以通过轮流回答这副联合创始人牌中的问题来更好地了解他们...... 更多地了解对方，这样你们才能更好地合作和单独工作。
localize.tagline: 问你的联合创始人一些问题，以便更好地了解对方。

localize.description: 下次你和你的聯合創始人或潛在的合作伙伴在一起的時候，可以通過輪流回答這副聯合創始人牌中的問題來更好地瞭解他們...... 更多地瞭解對方，這樣你們才能更好地合作和單獨工作。
localize.tagline: 問你的聯合創始人一些問題，以便更好地瞭解對方。

previous.excerpt: purME Air is a powered mask that makes breathing safer and easier. Breathe only filtered air supplied by twin turbines. Block out 99.5% of microorganisms with FFP1, N95 and P100 filters. Sterilize your mask in under 5 minutes with a built-in UV-C unit.
previous.title: purME Air - Face mask that makes your breathing super safe and easy

localize.description: purME Air是一款让呼吸更安全、更轻松的动力面罩。只呼吸由双涡轮提供的过滤空气。使用FFP1、N95和P100过滤器，可阻隔99.5%的微生物。使用内置的UV-C装置在5分钟内对面罩进行消毒。
localize.tagline: 让您的呼吸超安全、超轻松的面罩。

localize.description: purME Air是一款讓呼吸更安全、更輕鬆的動力面罩。只呼吸由雙渦輪提供的過濾空氣。使用FFP1、N95和P100過濾器，可阻隔99.5%的微生物。使用內置的UV-C裝置在5分鐘內對面罩進行消毒。
localize.tagline: 讓您的呼吸超安全、超輕鬆的面罩。

next.excerpt: tabExtend helps you manage your tabs. The browser extension replaces your new tab with an overview where you can create groups containing your tabs, notes, and text-snippets. Visually organize it all with ease using drag and drop and handy shortcuts.
next.title: tabExtend - Easily save tabs and quickly create notes in your browser

localize.description: tabExtend帮助你管理你的标签页。浏览器扩展将你的新标签页替换为一个概览，在那里你可以创建包含你的标签页、笔记和文本片段的组。使用拖放和方便的快捷键，可以轻松地组织所有的标签页。
localize.tagline: 轻松保存标签，并在浏览器中快速创建笔记。

localize.description: tabExtend幫助你管理你的標籤頁。瀏覽器擴展將你的新標籤頁替換爲一個概覽，在那裏你可以創建包含你的標籤頁、筆記和文本片段的組。使用拖放和方便的快捷鍵，可以輕鬆地組織所有的標籤頁。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆保存標籤，並在瀏覽器中快速創建筆記。
